thread.section_title: Ivisaonline отзывы | Отзывы клиентов о Ivisaonline | ivisaonline.com
thread.title: John - Alexandria

author: John - Alexandria
title: John - Alexandria
text: Good experience in submitting the visa application. The online application could use improvement. For example after completing the application it is not possible to edit or update the application. Only when the application is partially filled out can it be updated. It would much better to let the applicant work with the application until it is complete no matter what the level of the form being filled out. Only the applicant would determine when it is final and then print it out.
